sub.description: subject, i.e. the id of the principal's authorization as available from TAS via SAML assertion

aud.description: audience - the app producing the API, i.e. the one consuming the token

inc.description: incarnation of the tenant (store) at the time the token was issued

iat.description: time the token was issued, as per the spec.

exp.description: time the token expires, as per the spec.
